headline: Oakland-Area High School Seniors Graduate from Financial Education Program Earning $7,000 PG&E College Scholarships
summary: Twenty-five high school students will receive $7,000 scholarships when they graduate from the PG&E Community Financial Education Program on Saturday (Feb. 7) at the University of California, Berkeley. The program provides students with advanced financial education.

headline: PG&E and Itron Expand Collaboration to Enhance Customer Experience and Improve Grid Management with Distributed Intelligence
summary: OAKLAND, Calif. and LIBERTY LAKE, Wash., Feb. 03, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) and Itron are embarking on the next phase of their collaboration to transform the energy landscape, enhance the customer experience, reduce wildfire risk and create a more reliable and flexible grid. Building on the companies’ existing EV Connect collaboration, PG&E is further integrating and deploying Itron’s Grid Edge Intelligence solutions to help: Make home electrification easie

headline: Salesforce’s Army Cloud Deal And Wildfire Venture Versus Recent Stock Weakness
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) has secured a $5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to modernize operations using cloud and AI via its subsidiary Computable Insights LLC. The company is also launching EMBERPOINT LLC with Lockheed Martin, PG&E Corporation, and Wells Fargo to apply AI and data tools to wildfire detection, prevention, and emergency response. These moves extend Salesforce's reach into public sector modernization and emergency management alongside its core enterprise software...
